added-queue: %%GREEN%%Added to shop creation queue. Touch where you want to create.
added-rm-queue: %%GREEN%%Added shop removal queue. Touch where you want to remove.
shop-create-failed: %%RED%%Failed to create shop due to unknown reason.
no-permission-buy: %%RED%%You don't have permission to buy item.
no-money: You do not have %%RED%%%MONETARY_UNIT%%1%%RESET%% to buy %%RED%%%2%%RESET.
full-inventory: %%RED%%You do not have inventory slot to buy item.
failed-buy: %%RED%%Failed to buy item due to unknown reason.
bought-item: You have bought item %2 of %%AQUA%%%1%%RESET%% for %%GOLD%%%MONETARY_UNIT%%3%%RESET%%.
